questions.question: What is the name of the ominous outcropping protruding north from Bunsen Peak?
Bunsen Peak was named for a man who is also affiliated with which success?
options: signing the Yellowstone National Park Protection Act

questions.question: The flame of a Bunsen burner resembles this Yellowstone feature that Dr. Robert Bunsen researched:
Sheepeater Cliffs are just down the road from Bunsen Peak.  They were named for a band of Shoshone Indians called the Sheepeaters.  They used this material to craft powerful hunting bows:
